item.title: DEB
item.description: Audience The audience for this document is people who wish to use our setup tooling which bring significant improvements over the upstream setup scripts. Description We publish our Ubuntu/Debian tooling in our DEB repository. These are packages for software not available from upstream in package format. In some cases, such as ZFS, our packages are significantly newer. All of the software published in our repository works on Ubuntu 20.04. Our packages that do not link to specific dependencies (such as glibc) should work on any Debian derivative, such as our elrond-* packages.

item.title: RPM
item.description: Audience The audience for this document is people who wish to use our setup tooling which bring significant improvements over the upstream setup scripts. Description We publish our Enterprise Linux 8 tooling in our RPM repository. These are packages for software not available from upstream in package format. In some cases, such as ZFS, our packages are significantly newer. All of the software published in our repository works on Enterprise Linux 8, whether Red Hat, CentOS, Oracle, or Rocky Linux.
